channel.title: Learning Java
channel.description:
Ok, I need a somewhat [b]easy[/b] way to learn Java, I've tried many ways, but shit it gets boring after awhile, so can someone please help me out on this :/
Thanks!
-Natey

item.title: Learning Java
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“HiddenPker, post:15, topic:286201”]wrong section move/[/quote]Stop trying to be mod, it will never happen kid, and this is the help section, and I’m asking for help, dumbfuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Learning Java
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:9, topic:286201”][quote author=Tree link=topic=378535.msg2847155#msg2847155 date=1246342862]
the really big index - google it.

Don’t expect to pick up Java with ease or in a small amount of time.
Oh, and don’t listen to wolfs goal.
[/quote]

wtf man omg…

thats how i learned it…

learning java piece by piece is way easier than all in your face[/quote]
I seriously doubt you’ve learned everything there is to know about java.

Read full topic

item.title: Learning Java
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

No one can spoon-feed you, if you want to learn something, you do it.
Here’s a little something to get you started: www.google.com

Read full topic

item.title: Learning Java
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:11, topic:286201”][quote author=Natey link=topic=378535.msg2847170#msg2847170 date=1246343346]

the really big index - google it.

Don’t expect to pick up Java with ease or in a small amount of time.
Oh, and don’t listen to wolfs goal.

wtf man omg…

thats how i learned it…

learning java piece by piece is way easier than all in your face
[/quote]No offence, but I think I’m going to take it from the Java Guru

Ok, the Java Guru has more experience than you, but when your learning all at once and your brain craps out dont come crawling to me[/quote]
Only if you have a piece of shit for a brain.

Read full topic

item.title: Learning Java
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“heroisgay, post:2, topic:286201”][ul][li]Do it the boring way[/li]
[li]Find someone with no time on their hands to make a “fun and easy” tut[/li][/ul][/quote]When I say that, I don’t really mean easy, I mean in a way where I can learn without being bored to death, if you don’t contribute to this topic then please get the fuck off, thanks.
-Natey

Read full topic

item.title: Learning Java
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:1, topic:286201”]Ok, I need some fun and easy ways to learn Java, I’ve tried many ways, but shit it gets boring after awhile, so can someone please help me out on this

Thanks!

-Natey[/quote]

How dare you say java is boring -.-

And the easiest way to learn it is learn basic parts first

start learning:

Voids

then:

Boolean

next:

Process

last:

whatever you want
